rules.ruleString: Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {PGC5001, VCG5011}
Must be enrolled in course version {3454, 3460, 3462, 3465, 3467, 3468, 3470, P4001}

description: This unit will require each student to present two Journal clubs to the class, following the guidelines introduced in PGC5001 (Evidence based practice). Journal articles for reviews will be clinical trials of therapy and will be assessed according to their validity, importance and applicability. This assessment will incorporate a description of the study design and standard of reporting. Students will be required to present an education session at their workplace on the topic of critical appraisal, run a journal club for their colleagues, and reflect on the experience.
faculty: Faculty of Pharmacy and Pharmaceutical Sciences
